results.content: Very Good for an hour. NOTE this is ONLY for the FREE VERSION. I hope he will do a follow up on the PRO version and some more add-on reviews. But overall I am glad I purchased this.

response.content: Brian, i'm so glad to read that you found this course to be of value. Thank you for taking the course and taking the time to study through the whole course content. Yes, i'll be uploading a course for the Elementor PRO version soonest. All the best.
